author: rooneg
msg: (speedyfeed_filter): reset r->status_line when we're returning an error,
otherwise we end up returning a 226 even when there's a problem.

author: rooneg
msg: (write_element): add an argument to carry around the current xml:lang for
the parent node, if we have a xml:lang for our current node and the parent
has none or the parent's is different add an xml:lang attribute.
(write_document): pass a NULL xml:lang into write_element.
